# Harm, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level: [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]]**, Dread Necromancer 9

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 20th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 20]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 20 ft

**Area:** 20-ft.-radius burst centered on caster

**Targets:** All creatures except the caster in the area

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Horror (WotC), pg. 130

As *[[Harm, Greater (Spell)|greater harm]]**,* except as noted above.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Cleric 9 to Level per Dragon Magazine 304, pg 37.
